content.rendered:
Indulge in an assortment of Loco Love‘s most loved artisan chocolates, with our ‘Lover’s Box‘ selection. It’s the perfect gift of indulgence, featuring a range of their finest flavours elegantly presented in a luxurious gift box. Only one question now remains; which one will you choose first?

Handmade in the picturesque coastal town of Byron Bay , nestled on the far-north coast of New South Wales, each chocolate is made with 100% natural ingredients, organic, vegan, soy and refined sugar free, gluten free, and supporting 100% sustainably sourced cocoa. With chocolate that offers benefits beyond just taste, we’re confident you’ll notice and enjoy the difference.

Presented in our signature gift bag and trailing ribbon.

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
